医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
早期怀孕早期叶酸剂量提高儿童的口头和行为能力根据今天于2025年3月4日发布的初步研究，在怀孕的头三个月期间服用更高剂量的叶酸是安全的，并且与六岁的儿童的口头能力以及改善的行为能力有关，该研究将于2025年3月4日发布，该研究将在美国神经病学会的第77届年度会议上于4月5-9日举行，于2025年4月5-9日在Sanigo和Onli举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/higher-foric-acid-doses-in----in------------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/higher-folic-acid-doses-in------------------------------------------------- improve-verbal-verbal-and-behavioral-skillal-skills-in-Children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79ee32d-8b61-44f4-93ec-3EC-3FD09979904F1 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:26:15 -0500 Higher folic acid doses in early pregnancy improve verbal and behavioral skills in children
研究人员通过将大脑信号解码为文本培训AI阅读思维科学家开发了Brainllm，该模型使用fMRI和AI将大脑活动转化为自然语言，表现优于先前的基于分类的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/researchers-train-ai-train-train-to-read-mindse28094by-decoding-decoding-brain-brain-signals-into-into-text.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/researchers-train-ai-train-train-to-to-read-mindse28094by-decoding-decoding-decoding-brain-brain-signals-into-into-text.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93dda1a1-4852-4852-4b50-8692-12c7915b2641 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:21:00 -0500 Researchers train AI to read minds—by decoding brain signals into text
研究揭示了焦虑和冷漠如何影响决策在不确定的情况下做出决定是日常生活的一部分。明尼苏达大学医学院的新研究发现了焦虑和冷漠 - 两个常见但截然不同的情绪状态 - 在人们学习和做出决策方面产生了根本不同的模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/study-reveals-how-anxiety-and-apathy-apathy-apthy-apthy-aptect-decision-making.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/study-reveals-how-anxiety-and-apathy-apathy-apthy-apthy-aptect-decision-making.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3eb7968f-9165-4935-4935-aff1-aff1-aff1-b7a4624999df9 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:20:35 -0500 Study reveals how anxiety and apathy affect decision-making
良好的睡眠卫生在青年脑震荡恢复中起着至关重要的作用全国儿童医院的研究人员发现，在脑震荡恢复方面，睡眠很重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/good-sleep-hygiene-plays-crucial-role--on-youth-conconcussion-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/good-sleep-hygiene-plays-crucial-role--on-youth-conconcussion-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf872503-a993-444b-9eee-dfa8d681e7b5 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:17:06 -0500 Good sleep hygiene plays crucial role in youth concussion recovery
澳大利亚原住民的哮喘和过敏率更高昆士兰州大学的研究人员发现，与其他澳大利亚人相比，原住民在医院患有哮喘和其他相关疾病的可能性是医院的两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/asthma-and-andergy-rates-rates-higher-mong-mong-first-nation-people-in-australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/asthma-and-higher-higher-------------------------------------rustralia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a679a3f-5b2b-4d58-4d58-86b1-9b1-9b4c91739b1b Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:12:26 -0500 Asthma and allergy rates higher among First Nations people in Australia
残疾人成年人的处方药滥用率更高根据西弗吉尼亚大学的研究，滥用处方药的可能性几乎是没有残疾的成年人的两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/prescription-drug-misuse-rates-rates-rates-higher-mong-among-apruts-with-disabilities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/prescription-drug-misuse-rates-rates-rates-higher-mong-among-apruts-with-disabilities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9E27E665-6EB3-47E5-9F35-4492C5B7903F Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:06:00 -0500 Prescription drug misuse rates higher among adults with disabilities

精液质量与男性长寿相关根据对近80,000名男性的研究，男性精液质量与他们的寿命有关，该研究今天（星期三）在《人类繁殖》上发表，《人类繁殖》是世界领先的生殖医学期刊之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/semen-quality-linked-to-longevity-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/semen-quality-linked-to-longevity-ingevity-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa7ab5a7-14f5-45E6-8BFC-98EFCF126D06 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 20:58:08 -0500 Semen quality linked to longevity in men
